title: Boys holding up signs reading "Give for the life of a child / March of Dimes," from left, front row: Tyler Thompson, Paul Sheard, Gary Gilmore, William Scott, and Gary Stevens; second row: Clifford Nicholson, James Bright, Ronald Peters, Howard Humphries, Calvin Humphries, Ronald Sheard, Robert Dawin, and Ernest Pollard; back row: Tyrone Scott and Jerry Tate, posed in interior, possibly Hill City
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
provenance_text: The Estate of Charles H. Harris, Pittsburgh
